Header 1 Header 2 Header 3 Row 1, Col 1 Row 1, Col 2 Row 1, Col 3 Row 2, Col 1 Row 2, Col 2 Row 2, Col 3 Row 3, Col 1 Row 3, Col 2 Row 3, Col 3 This is a really big heading!! #This is a tiny heading! #Hellooooooooooooo
What’s On in Leamington Spa! üéâ #Welcome to the heart of Leamington Spa’s vibrant event scene! Whether you’re a local or just visiting, get ready to dive into a world of culture, music, food, and fun. Here’s a glimpse of what’s happening this month.
üéµ Leamington Music Festival #Date: September 15th - 17th Venue: Royal Spa Centre
Immerse yourself in three days of enchanting classical performances. Featuring renowned orchestras and emerging local talent, this festival is a must for any music lover. Grab your tickets early as they’re selling fast!
“A beautiful symphony of sound in a stunning setting.” - Leamington Echo
üçî The Big Foodie Bash #Date: September 23rd Venue: The Parade (Parade Gardens)
Prepare your taste buds for a culinary adventure! The Big Foodie Bash brings together the best of Leamington’s street food vendors, artisan producers, and craft breweries. From sizzling burgers to gourmet vegetarian delights, there’s something to satisfy every craving. Live music and family-friendly activities will be running all day.
Highlights:
Local cider tasting Interactive cooking demonstrations Kids’ zone with face painting üé® Art in the Park #Date: September 30th Venue: Jephson Gardens
Spend a glorious afternoon in the picturesque Jephson Gardens, celebrating local artistry. Browse unique paintings, sculptures, and handmade crafts from over 50 artists. It’s the perfect opportunity to find that special piece for your home or simply get inspired by Leamington’s creative spirit.
Looking Ahead… #Don’t miss the Royal Leamington Spa Half Marathon on October 8th! Get your running shoes ready or come out and cheer on the participants. It’s a fantastic community event that fills the streets with energy.
